price: ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߛߎߡߊ߲ߠߌ߲ ߠߊߟߐ߬ ߕߋߟߋ߲ ߠߊ߫ ߸ ߊߟߎ߫ ߞߊߣߊ߬ ߖߊ߭ ߘߐߘߛߏ߫
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلۡوَزۡنَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَلَا تُخۡسِرُواْ ٱلۡمِيزَانَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-wazna bil-qis'ṭi walā tukh'sirū al-mīzāna
